dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare approach me, puny creature. What do you want from a Frost Giant like me?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, I seek a peaceful resolution.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Bah! Weakling words. Do you think I'm a fool to trust you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand your doubts, but I offer you my respect and willingness to negotiate.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? Negotiate? This Frost Giant needs no pity! What use do I have for respect from a mere mortal like you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see you have no interest in a peaceful solution. I shall leave you be.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hmph, you finally understand your place. Begone from my sight, insignificant being!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Enough of your arrogance! If you won't listen, then I'll make you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Oh, trying to challenge me? How amusing! Prepare to face the wrath of a Frost Giant!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense your power and strength. I offer you my assistance and loyalty.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Assistance? Loyalty? Your words hold no weight. What can a weak creature like you offer me?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I can prove my worth through actions. Let me aid you in your endeavors.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Actions speak louder than words, mortal. Very well, show me what you're capable of.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your arrogance blinds you. I will not waste more words on you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Blind? Arrogance? Ha! You are amusing, little creature. Farewell, insignificant one!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking a challenge. Test your strength against mine.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenge, you say? Bold words from such a small being. Let's see if you can handle the might of a Frost Giant.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am prepared for whatever you throw at me. Let the battle begin!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impressive courage, I'll give you that. Face the icy fists of a Frost Giant, fool!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: This was a mistake. I shall retreat and leave you be.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Retreat? Cowardice! Never show your face before me again, pathetic creature!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge about your kind. Can you share your wisdom with me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom? Ha! Mortals like you cannot comprehend the knowledge of a Frost Giant. What makes you think I'll share my wisdom?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I respect your intelligence and seek to learn from your experiences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect, intelligence? Your flattery does not impress me, small one. I have no time for your meaningless chatter.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see my words fall on deaf ears. Farewell, Frost Giant.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Yes, leave and never return. The knowledge of Frost Giants is not meant for the likes of you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your arrogance blinds you from the value of sharing knowledge. I will seek wisdom elsewhere.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Arrogance? You dare question me? Be gone, insignificant being, before I crush you underfoot!
